summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Smart Fleet Manager application. All core features are working correctly including user authentication, vehicle management, route planning with 3 route types, trip management, FASTag payments, and live fleet tracking.

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown selection using text selectors is not reliable - options may not be visible for direct clicking

passed_tests: Dashboard rendering with all 5 tabs (Live Map, Vehicles, Plan Route, Trip History, FASTag)
Vehicle management: Add, view, delete vehicles
Live fleet map with OpenStreetMap integration and vehicle markers
Route planner: Calculate 3 route types (fastest, economy, scenic) with metrics
Route visualization on map with polylines and start/end markers
Trip creation, starting, and completion workflow
FASTag mock payment processing with 95% success rate simulation
Transaction history display with proper stats
All backend API endpoints (16/16 tests passed)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (minor dropdown interaction issue, all core functionality works)
